lyrics_abstract:
It's a major move right here baby
You gotta get wit it or get lost
Ya understand? Yeah

It's Young Lloyd reporting live from Atlanta, Georgia
(And Weezy F Baby)
Decatur where it's great
And uh, I want all my sexy ladies
To report to the dance floor immediately
We gon go it and glide dis one ya'll, speak Weezy, gyeah

Right off the back am I the boy got dollars
So women come frequent like flight mileage
It ain't no secret I, I mi[...]
